text: sǣma janatāvagenma (apagē dūtayinva ovunṭa) sākṣi vaśayen kæn̆davā tabāgena, (ovunṭa “mā hæra, devivarun yayi oba ārādhanā karamin siṭiyā noveda, eyaṭa ayat) obagē sādhakayan gena enu” yayi api pavasana avasthāvedī ovun boruvaṭa manakkalpitava (deviyan yayi) pavasamin siṭi dæya siyalla ovunva athæra damā sæn̆gavī, satya (vū dēvatvaya) allāh ek kenekuṭama niyata vaśayenma ayitiya yanna ovun dæna ganu æta
